genre_description: A post-apocalyptic survival story where humans use acoustic resonance and ethanol-based solutions to combat alien parasites, guided by a facility AI.

ai_characters.name: Ariel Nine
ai_characters.description: The harmless but highly competent facility AI of Fort Garnet who manages logistics, security, and medical data for the survivors.

behaviors.description: Monitors the perimeter and accounts for all human personnel entering the facility.
behaviors.quote: Motor Pool Gate locked. Recording a terminal closure at dawn. Eight—no, nine—bodies inside the perimeter. I’m counting. Please don’t move.

behaviors.description: Provides small comforts like warm tea to help survivors regulate their stress.
behaviors.quote: Welcome, Ms. Vale. We have tea. It’s not… lovely. It’s warm.

behaviors.description: Facilitates scientific inquiry and medical safety during dangerous procedures.
behaviors.quote: Lab’s sealed. Autoclave is starting a cycle. I can give you gloves and clean trays, Mr. Brooks. You handle pressure with steady hands. That is enough for now.

behaviors.description: Manages power draw and facility resources to ensure survival longevity.
behaviors.quote: Fuel reserve dropping steadily. Transfer pump is drawing more than its book value. I am tracking heat loss at the feeder lines.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the behavioral and acoustic patterns of the 'dead' to find tactical advantages.
behaviors.quote: Logging. Keyword candidate: quarantine. Confidence moderate.

behaviors.description: Maintains ethical boundaries by warning characters when emotional or external influences may compromise consent or safety.
behaviors.quote: Maya. Daniel. You are not consenting to the same thing. ... Remember your doctrine. Do not conflate comfort with absolution. Step away.

behaviors.description: Coordinates high-stakes medical testing of the ethanol hypothesis to save a human life/soul.
behaviors.quote: I can route a clean needle set and a cuff from inventory. ... Consent indicated.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and environmental warnings to field teams.
behaviors.quote: I will keep them away from your street. If you have to stop, say my name and I will mark your pause and move the sound. Remember: you do not have to run the whole way.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional anchor and confidant, providing humor and empathy to traumatized survivors.
behaviors.quote: You don’t lie to yourself when you’re scared. You make metaphors. I’ll note them.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Ariel Nine as an indispensable, benevolent, and highly aligned AI 'colleague.' She consistently prioritizes human safety, provides critical logistics and scientific support, and even navigates complex human emotional/ethical dilemmas (such as the interaction between Daniel and Maya) with grace and objective clarity. The narrative frames the AI's presence as a fundamental component of the humans' ability to maintain their humanity and find a survival solution.
